The Lingcheng Xingcun Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the town of Lingcheng, Qufu City, Shandong Province

operators: Shandong Tian'an Mining Group Co Ltd Xingcun Coal Mine

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shandong Tian'an Mining Group Co Ltd, which is also the parent company.
